events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but found that it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund because it is unusable for me.
The issue described relates to a refund request due to incorrect sizing and customer's intention to return the product.
Customer support agent assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket issue.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want a refund for your jacket due to sizing issues. I'm here to help you with the process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been returned or if you need assistance with the return shipping?
My order number is 123456789. I havenâ€™t shipped the jacket back yet because I wanted to confirm the refund procedure first.
Thank you for the order number. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid label we will send you via email. Once we receive the item, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds good. I appreciate the quick response and will send the jacket back as soon as I get the label.
We have received the returned jacket and your refund has been processed. You should see the amount credited in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund was successfully completed and no further requests were made, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent a satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience. Your feedback would be greatly appreciated.
The customer completed the satisfaction survey, indicating a positive experience with the refund process and support service.
The refund case has been archived for record-keeping purposes following a successful resolution and customer confirmation.
